sourcesContent: import*as r from"react";import{isFunction as t}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useHasValueUpdated as o}from"@aws-amplify/ui-react-core";import{Storage as e}from"@aws-amplify/storage";const a=({key:a,options:c,fallbackURL:f,onStorageGetError:i})=>{const[m,s]=r.useState(),n=o(a);return r.useEffect((()=>{if(!n)return;const r=e.get(a,c).then((r=>s(r))).catch((r=>{t(i)&&i(r),f&&s(f)}));return()=>e.cancel(r)}),[a,c,f,i,n]),m};export{a as useStorageURL};
